title: Write a Film Review
description: A film critic needs to write a review of a new movie.

tasks.description: Briefly summarize the plot of the film without giving away major spoilers.
tasks.expected_outcome: A concise, spoiler-free summary is written.

tasks.description: Analyze the film's strengths and weaknesses, commenting on the acting, directing, screenplay, and cinematography.
tasks.expected_outcome: A balanced and critical analysis is provided.

tasks.description: Conclude with an overall assessment and a recommendation for who would enjoy this film.
tasks.expected_outcome: The review gives a clear final verdict.
